abstract: Spin, which has been the premier monthly magazine for alternative music for the past 26 years, is going bimonthly.
snippet: Spin, which has been the premier monthly magazine for alternative music for the past 26 years, is going bimonthly.
lead_paragraph: After 26 years as the premier monthly magazine for alternative music, Spin is going bimonthly.

headline.main: A New Schedule and New Feel for Spin Magazine
